page.title: 12Magor Farm,Tehidy.
page.content: {Magor Farm}is{230 acres}of arable land producing sheep,beef cattle,horses and fodder crops.The land was occupied in Roman times.Traces of a{Roman Villa are visible in dry weather.Truro Museum has artifacts from the site. {Mr.Williams}has farmed the land with his family for 30 years.It was part of the{Basset estate.}Game-keeper's cottages and a field called Pen Field, where pheasants were bred,survive. There are{200 animals}and{9 horses, including{2 mares}with foals.They also break and train horses for racing and eventing.The farm grows barley,oats, fodder beet,flat-pole cabbage and makes hay and silage which are used to feed the animals.The land produces good beef cattle.A milking herd gives {100 gallons}of milk a day.A 4ft well provides pure water and a {campsite makes extra income for Mr.Williams.
